package.name: Spotify AutoTouch Scripts for iPhone 6/s/7/8
package.shortDescription: Spotify AutoTouch scripts for iPhone 6-sized devices

descriptionlist.description: Spotify AutoTouch scripts for iPhone 6-sized devices. Ideal for usage with Assistant+ to trigger script playback once a song has been searched for.
Requires Assistant+ and AutoTouch to be installed
Uses Assistant+ group commands and an activator listener to play Spotify (songs, artists, albums, playlist)

changelog.change: Improved deb compression method for better compatibility
